newsitem.title: USA: Childtime adding six learning centers.
newsitem.headline: Childtime adding six learning centers.

text.p: Childtime Learning Centers Inc, the nation's fifth largest provider of child care and preschool services, said Monday it opened two facilities in the metropolitan Houston, Texas area.
Four additional centers -- located in Chandler, Ariz.; Tucson, Ariz.; Orange Park, Fla.; and Lawrenceville, Ga. -- are under construction and will be opened later this year.
The addition of the two new centers brings Childtime's total metropolitan Houston presence to 15, and its Texas presence to 27.
The company, which went public in February 1996, had 213 centers in 15 states and the District of Columbia as of April 1997.
